title: I have a 70% win rate yet I'm not progessing
body:
Finding out the hard way that it's not how many games you win, it's when you win them. I'm generally having to win 1 more than loss ie 2 wins per 1 loss, and twice today I've ended up on 99LP. Obviously my MMR is affecting it but shouldn't it really be sorting itself out with a 70% win rate?

PS, people forcing you to support when you've picked a mid champ is SICK

replies.body: To be honest, If your MMR is screwed (under 800) you will be trapped with trolls and AFKers. Your best bet is to make a new account and level it. Its way faster then trying to fight ur way out of bronze. Riot has made it impossible to climb out once trapped.

Well it is because you have a 50% win rate, but a 60% winrate over the last 20 games.

Having a 50% win rate means that you are where you are suppose to be.

But I talked to some of my plat/diamond mates and they say the way they got out of gold is the following:

* Learn your personal lane matchups -> this includes counters, powerspikes ect.
* Decision making -> Get better with decision making, make quicker decisions after each team fight

It's not much and all I can do. 

Also you have a kda that is very close. So maybe try and die less. Here is your stats:
